title: 45% cdr xD
body:
Everyone person who plays Thresh should play 45% cdr thresh (inspired by bunnyfufuu) 

coin
sightstone
coin upgrade tier 2 - not speed boost one the one before that one
kindlegem
ionian boots
glacial shroud

ps you need to put the extra 5 cdr in your masteries or runes depenging on what you prefer. 

HOOKS FOR DAYS XD

replies.body: 45% cdr is for people who make alot of mistakes kappa

Actually if you fuck up constantly your better off with the relic shield build that bunnyfufu does, which focuses on Courage of the colossus.

45% CDR only really works if you constantly hit your hook.
puts the hook on a 6.6 cooldown, or a 3.6 second cd if you hit anything with it. such cc. wow.

> Everyone person 

The lack of grammar in recent posts is triggering me

> [{quoted}](name=Fitzky,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=E0mwbbWn,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-12-15T10:55:36.698+0000)
>
> The lack of grammar in recent posts is triggering me

Autocorrect lol, gotta love it.

>ps you need to put the extra 5 cdr in your masteries or runes depenging on what you prefer.

No it has to be the masteries, the CDR Mastery is the only way to be able to hit 45% CDR, otherwise you'll hit the cap of 40%.

> [{quoted}](name=Valor Carrys,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=E0mwbbWn,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-12-15T09:33:16.777+0000)
>
> No it has to be the masteries, the CDR Mastery is the only way to be able to hit 45% CDR, otherwise you'll hit the cap of 40%.

K, I used masteries so I just assumed it would work with runes. Thanks for clearing that up.
